trans-unit.source: Manage Azure Backup vaults and servers | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Manage Azure Backup vaults and servers | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Use this tutorial to learn how to manage Azure Backup vaults and servers.
trans-unit.target: Use this tutorial to learn how to manage Azure Backup vaults and servers.

trans-unit.source: Manage Azure Backup vaults and servers
trans-unit.target: Manage Azure Backup vaults and servers

trans-unit.source: In this article you'll find an overview of the backup management tasks available through the management portal.
trans-unit.target: In this article you'll find an overview of the backup management tasks available through the management portal.

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the [Management Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com).
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the [Management Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com).

trans-unit.source: Click **Recovery Services**, then click the name of backup vault to view the Quick Start page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Recovery Services**, then click the name of backup vault to view the Quick Start page.

trans-unit.source: By selecting the options at the top of the Quick Start page, you can see the available management tasks.
trans-unit.target: By selecting the options at the top of the Quick Start page, you can see the available management tasks.

trans-unit.source: Protected items
trans-unit.target: Protected items

trans-unit.source: Dashboard
trans-unit.target: Dashboard

trans-unit.source: Select **Dashboard** to see the usage overview for the server.
trans-unit.target: Select **Dashboard** to see the usage overview for the server.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the Dashboard you can perform the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the Dashboard you can perform the following tasks:

trans-unit.source: **Manage certificate**.
trans-unit.target: **Manage certificate**.

trans-unit.source: If a certificate was used to register the server, then use this to update the certificate.
trans-unit.target: If a certificate was used to register the server, then use this to update the certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you are using vault credentials, do not use **Manage certificate**.
trans-unit.target: If you are using vault credentials, do not use **Manage certificate**.

trans-unit.source: **Delete**.
trans-unit.target: **Delete**.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current backup vault.
trans-unit.target: Deletes the current backup vault.

trans-unit.source: If a backup vault is no longer being used, you can delete it to free up storage space.
trans-unit.target: If a backup vault is no longer being used, you can delete it to free up storage space.

trans-unit.source: **Delete** is only enabled after all registered servers have been deleted from the vault.
trans-unit.target: **Delete** is only enabled after all registered servers have been deleted from the vault.

trans-unit.source: **Vault credentials**.
trans-unit.target: **Vault credentials**.

trans-unit.source: Use this Quick Glance menu item to configure your vault credentials.
trans-unit.target: Use this Quick Glance menu item to configure your vault credentials.

trans-unit.source: Protected Items
trans-unit.target: Protected Items

trans-unit.source: Select **Protected Items** to view the items that have been backed up from the servers.
trans-unit.target: Select **Protected Items** to view the items that have been backed up from the servers.

trans-unit.source: This list is for information purposes only.
trans-unit.target: This list is for information purposes only.

trans-unit.source: Protected items
trans-unit.target: Protected items

trans-unit.source: Registered Items
trans-unit.target: Registered Items

trans-unit.source: Select **Registered Items** to view the names of the servers that are registered to this vault.
trans-unit.target: Select **Registered Items** to view the names of the servers that are registered to this vault.

trans-unit.source: Deleted Server
trans-unit.target: Deleted Server

trans-unit.source: From here you can perform the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: From here you can perform the following tasks:

trans-unit.source: **Allow Re-registration** - When this option is selected for a server you can use the **Registration Wizard** in the agent to register the server with the backup vault a second time.
trans-unit.target: **Allow Re-registration** - When this option is selected for a server you can use the **Registration Wizard** in the agent to register the server with the backup vault a second time.

trans-unit.source: You might need to re-register due to an error in the certificate or if a server had to be rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: You might need to re-register due to an error in the certificate or if a server had to be rebuilt.

trans-unit.source: Re-registration is allowed only once per server name.
trans-unit.target: Re-registration is allowed only once per server name.

trans-unit.source: **Delete** - Deletes a server from the backup vault.
trans-unit.target: **Delete** - Deletes a server from the backup vault.

trans-unit.source: All of the stored data associated with the server is deleted immediately.
trans-unit.target: All of the stored data associated with the server is deleted immediately.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Restore Windows Server or Windows Client from Azure
trans-unit.target: Restore Windows Server or Windows Client from Azure

trans-unit.source: To learn more about Azure Backup, see [Azure Backup Overview](backup-introduction-to-azure-backup.md)
trans-unit.target: To learn more about Azure Backup, see [Azure Backup Overview](backup-introduction-to-azure-backup.md)

trans-unit.source: Visit the [Azure Backup Forum](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=290933)
trans-unit.target: Visit the [Azure Backup Forum](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=290933)

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
